text: Beautiful, felt right at home. Itâ€™s in a perfect spot atop of the hills with a magnificent view of the bay. Maybe the drive getting up but it was rush hour. Once you are in the hotel everything is walking distance.
reviewText: Beautiful, felt right at home. Itâ€™s in a perfect spot atop of the hills with a magnificent view of the bay. Maybe the drive getting up but it was rush hour. Once you are in the hotel everything is walking distance.
summary: Guest found the hotel to be in a perfect spot with magnificent views, noting that while the drive up could be busy, everything was within walking distance once at the hotel.

text: Great hotel, friendly staff - minor improvement points. Me and my friends had an amazing time staying at NiiRA. The staff was the most friendly I've ever encountered, they went above and beyond on service to make us feel good. Super close to the beach, rooms were amazing and food for dinner was the main highlight. You must try the local food there, probably the best we had throughout our days in Mirissa. Only 2 downsides to the stay so you are aware: - The hotel is located on a hill so expect to walk up when coming back from the beach. Would be great if they improved the road on the way or something similar to make the way up easier - The staff still feels quite new to the role (it's a new hotel) so expect some delays on food and service isn't still at the same level as the hotel itself. But they are always super willing and friendly which makes up for any out of sync issues
reviewText: Great hotel, friendly staff - minor improvement points. Me and my friends had an amazing time staying at NiiRA. The staff was the most friendly I've ever encountered, they went above and beyond on service to make us feel good. Super close to the beach, rooms were amazing and food for dinner was the main highlight. You must try the local food there, probably the best we had throughout our days in Mirissa. Only 2 downsides to the stay so you are aware: - The hotel is located on a hill so expect to walk up when coming back from the beach. Would be great if they improved the road on the way or something similar to make the way up easier - The staff still feels quite new to the role (it's a new hotel) so expect some delays on food and service isn't still at the same level as the hotel itself. But they are always super willing and friendly which makes up for any out of sync issues
keyPhrases: food for dinner was the main highlight
summary: Guest had an amazing time at NiiRA, praising the friendly staff, beach proximity, and food, but noted the hotel's hill location and that the new staff occasionally caused delays.

text: You must stay here. Location, design of hotel and the rooms are fabulous.
reviewText: You must stay here. Location, design of hotel and the rooms are fabulous.
summary: Guest highly recommends the hotel, praising its fabulous location, design, and rooms.

text: Beyond fabulous! Absolutely everything!! The decor, the service, the people, the care. 100% recommend anyone who want to get lost in this paradise called Niira :)
reviewText: Beyond fabulous! Absolutely everything!! The decor, the service, the people, the care. 100% recommend anyone who want to get lost in this paradise called Niira :)
summary: Guest found the hotel beyond fabulous, recommending it for its decor, service, people, and care.

text: Exceptional. Everything about the hotel was great and staff were friendly and helpful. Loud music from a neighbouring bar.
reviewText: Exceptional. Everything about the hotel was great and staff were friendly and helpful. Loud music from a neighbouring bar.
summary: Guest found everything about the hotel great, with friendly and helpful staff, but experienced loud music from a neighboring bar.

text: Great team, and good concept. Newly built property, tastefully designed, great amenities, very clean, close to the beach, and restaurants, the team communicated very well and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable
reviewText: Great team, and good concept. Newly built property, tastefully designed, great amenities, very clean, close to the beach, and restaurants, the team communicated very well and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable
summary: Guest praised the great team and concept of the newly built property, highlighting its tasteful design, amenities, cleanliness, and proximity to the beach and restaurants.

text: Perfect stay in Mirissa. The hotel is brand new, beautifully designed with great restaurant and super helpful and friendly staff. I am glad I picked it for my birthday night! :) Nothing :)
reviewText: Perfect stay in Mirissa. The hotel is brand new, beautifully designed with great restaurant and super helpful and friendly staff. I am glad I picked it for my birthday night! :) Nothing :)
summary: Guest had a perfect stay in Mirissa at the brand new, beautifully designed hotel with a great restaurant and super helpful and friendly staff.

text: Beautiful, elegant and serene. Beautiful design, relaxed environment and exceptionally friendly helpful. Thereâ€™s nothing to do like about this itâ€™s lovely. Still very new so a few things still in progress.
reviewText: Beautiful, elegant and serene. Beautiful design, relaxed environment and exceptionally friendly helpful. Thereâ€™s nothing to do like about this itâ€™s lovely. Still very new so a few things still in progress.
summary: Guest found the hotel beautiful, elegant, and serene with a lovely design, relaxed environment, and exceptionally friendly staff, noting it is still new with some things in progress.

text: Superb. Our two-day stay at Niira was absolutely excellent. The staff were incredibly helpful and genuinely kind, making us feel welcome from the moment we arrived. The breakfastâ€”whether Western or Sri Lankanâ€”was delicious, fresh, and beautifully prepared. The people running the property were amazing and always willing to assist with anything we needed. The place itself is stunning, with beautiful views and a lovely pool that made our stay even more relaxing. I highly recommend this wonderful property to anyone visiting the area. Itâ€™s truly a gem!
reviewText: Superb. Our two-day stay at Niira was absolutely excellent. The staff were incredibly helpful and genuinely kind, making us feel welcome from the moment we arrived. The breakfastâ€”whether Western or Sri Lankanâ€”was delicious, fresh, and beautifully prepared. The people running the property were amazing and always willing to assist with anything we needed. The place itself is stunning, with beautiful views and a lovely pool that made our stay even more relaxing. I highly recommend this wonderful property to anyone visiting the area. Itâ€™s truly a gem!
summary: Guest had an absolutely excellent two-day stay, highlighting the incredibly helpful and kind staff, delicious breakfast, stunning property, beautiful views, and lovely pool.

text: Exceptional. From the moment we arrived we felt so welcome. Sophie greeted us, our bags were swiftly taken off us and we were given ice cold freshly squeezed juice and refreshing cold towels to cool off. We felt VIP and it was lovely. The staff truly are exceptional here! Our rooms (109 &112) were spacious and had spectacular views overlooking the pool, jungle with a side view of the sea too. The meals were all incredible and the cocktails unreal...the tamarind inferno cocktail I will dream about for years to come, it was delicious ðŸ˜‹ I can't fault this hotel and I wish them every success Absolutely nothing we loved it all

summary: Guest felt exceptionally welcome from arrival, highlighting the VIP treatment, exceptional staff, spacious rooms with spectacular views, incredible meals, and delicious cocktails.

text: My friend and I really enjoyed our stay at Niira and would definitely stay there again on our next visit to Mirissa. The hotel is very modern and has a beautiful interior. We stayed in a room leading towards the bar terrace and the view was really nice. Staff were very welcoming and friendly throughout our stay. Staff were also very attentive and were always happy to help with any enquires.
reviewText: My friend and I really enjoyed our stay at Niira and would definitely stay there again on our next visit to Mirissa. The hotel is very modern and has a beautiful interior. We stayed in a room leading towards the bar terrace and the view was really nice. Staff were very welcoming and friendly throughout our stay. Staff were also very attentive and were always happy to help with any enquires.
summary: Guest and their friend thoroughly enjoyed their stay at Niira, finding the hotel modern with a beautiful interior, and praising the welcoming, friendly, and attentive staff.

text: 100% worth it, extremely professional and friendly staff. If you visit Mirissa make yourself a favour and stay to Niira hotel,worth every penny,
reviewText: 100% worth it, extremely professional and friendly staff. If you visit Mirissa make yourself a favour and stay to Niira hotel,worth every penny,
summary: Guest highly recommends the hotel, stating it's 100% worth it with extremely professional and friendly staff, and worth every penny.

text: Exceptional. I booked for 1 night at the end of my trip as a little bit of luxury and this did not disappoint! The service was outstanding from everyone I encountered throughout my stay & nothing was too much trouble. I had breakfast & dinner at the restaurant which was delicious and plenty of options. They even messaged prior to my check in to confirm any dietary requirements. The room was the standout which had incredible floor to ceiling windows looking out over the bay, absolutely stunning. The room itself was beautiful and included all the little touches for a luxury uplift. Huge thanks to the team that made my stay so special! I would highly recommend a visit to NiiRA!
reviewText: Exceptional. I booked for 1 night at the end of my trip as a little bit of luxury and this did not disappoint! The service was outstanding from everyone I encountered throughout my stay & nothing was too much trouble. I had breakfast & dinner at the restaurant which was delicious and plenty of options. They even messaged prior to my check in to confirm any dietary requirements. The room was the standout which had incredible floor to ceiling windows looking out over the bay, absolutely stunning. The room itself was beautiful and included all the little touches for a luxury uplift. Huge thanks to the team that made my stay so special! I would highly recommend a visit to NiiRA!
summary: Guest had an exceptional stay, finding the luxury experience did not disappoint with outstanding service, delicious food, and a standout room with stunning bay views.

text: Exceptional. Very nice, well equipped rooms, the view was amazing, very good breakfast, super clean, nice pool and terrace, very friendly staff
reviewText: Exceptional. Very nice, well equipped rooms, the view was amazing, very good breakfast, super clean, nice pool and terrace, very friendly staff
summary: Guest had an exceptional stay with very nice and well-equipped rooms, an amazing view, very good breakfast, a super clean and nice pool and terrace, and very friendly staff.

text: Exceptional. Fantastic stay at NiiRA. Extremely friendly and helpful staff
reviewText: Exceptional. Fantastic stay at NiiRA. Extremely friendly and helpful staff
summary: Guest had a fantastic stay at NiiRA, highlighting the extremely friendly and helpful staff.

text: A Perfect Stay at Niira. We had such a great time at Niira â€” honestly one of the best stays of our entire trip in Mirissa. The property is beautifully designed, modern, and luxurious, with thoughtful touches in every room that make the experience feel special. The hospitality was the biggest highlight. Everyoneâ€”from the owners to the managers to the staffâ€”was warm and genuinely invested in making our stay comfortable. A special shout-out to Chatur, who went above and beyond to take care of us throughout and made our anniversary feel really special. We also loved the variety of welcome drink options, including beer. The terrace restaurant, the cafÃ©, and the pool area are all incredibly scenic. From the terrace and restaurant you can watch surfers catching waves, and at night you get a beautiful view of the sea. The pool is another standout â€” not just stunning, but also equipped with a bar where you can order drinks while you relax. Itâ€™s honestly one of the nicest places to spend time on the property. Breakfast was fresh and delicious (the English breakfast was perfect), and the location is ideal â€” just a short walk to Mirissa Beach and the main street with cafÃ©s and shops. Overall, Niira stood out for its design, hospitality, and all the small personal touches that made our stay memorable. Highly recommend it, and weâ€™d love to come back.

text: Amazing overall and I would definitely go back. The staff really went out of there way to make our stay comfortable. Its a new property with an excellent design aesthetic that blends old and new. The food at the restaurant was delicious! The location is a bit hidden and getting there was confusing. A few street signs would help!
reviewText: Amazing overall and I would definitely go back. The staff really went out of there way to make our stay comfortable. Its a new property with an excellent design aesthetic that blends old and new. The food at the restaurant was delicious! The location is a bit hidden and getting there was confusing. A few street signs would help!
keyPhrases: staff went out of their way
summary: Guest found the hotel amazing overall and would return, praising the staff's efforts, excellent design, and delicious food, but noted the location was a bit hidden and confusing to find.

text: Superb. My partner and I recently stayed at NiiRa, a wonderful new addition to Mirissa, and had an exceptional experience. The rooms were absolutely lovely - modern, clean, and thoughtfully designed. The staff were incredibly friendly and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable, showing genuine warmth and professionalism throughout. The facilities were beautiful and clearly well cared for, adding to the relaxing atmosphere. Plus, the location couldnâ€™t be better - itâ€™s close to everything while still feeling peaceful. Overall, we had a fantastic stay and would highly recommend Hotel NiiRa to anyone visiting Mirissa!
reviewText: Superb. My partner and I recently stayed at NiiRa, a wonderful new addition to Mirissa, and had an exceptional experience. The rooms were absolutely lovely - modern, clean, and thoughtfully designed. The staff were incredibly friendly and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable, showing genuine warmth and professionalism throughout. The facilities were beautiful and clearly well cared for, adding to the relaxing atmosphere. Plus, the location couldnâ€™t be better - itâ€™s close to everything while still feeling peaceful. Overall, we had a fantastic stay and would highly recommend Hotel NiiRa to anyone visiting Mirissa!
summary: Guest had a superb and exceptional experience at NiiRa, praising the lovely, modern rooms, incredibly friendly staff, beautiful facilities, and excellent location.

text: The best hotel in the area. Beautiful setting, great staff, we felt very well looked after.
reviewText: The best hotel in the area. Beautiful setting, great staff, we felt very well looked after.
summary: Guest called it the best hotel in the area, highlighting its beautiful setting and great staff who made them feel well looked after.

text: Superb. We stayed at NiiRA for 4 nights at the end of a longer trip around Sri Lanka. The staff were so welcoming on our arrival and the manager Amila was very easily accessible for the duration of the stay. The hotel is beautiful with a lovely pool area, the rooms have everything you could need. We were able to request breakfast to our terrace in the morning, or have it in the dining area and they accommodated requests for different eating times to fit around activities. They were really helpful with recommendations for things to do and have a list of things you can book through the hotel. The restaurant food was delicious and so are the cocktails. It has a really nice vibe and is close by to the rest of Mirissa but out the way enough that it feels peaceful and relaxing. We also got treatments done at the spa. I would very much recommend staying here for some extremely reasonably priced luxury! Nothing!
reviewText: Superb. We stayed at NiiRA for 4 nights at the end of a longer trip around Sri Lanka. The staff were so welcoming on our arrival and the manager Amila was very easily accessible for the duration of the stay. The hotel is beautiful with a lovely pool area, the rooms have everything you could need. We were able to request breakfast to our terrace in the morning, or have it in the dining area and they accommodated requests for different eating times to fit around activities. They were really helpful with recommendations for things to do and have a list of things you can book through the hotel. The restaurant food was delicious and so are the cocktails. I would very much recommend staying here for some extremely reasonably priced luxury! Nothing!
summary: Guest had a superb stay, praising the welcoming staff and accessible manager, beautiful hotel with a lovely pool, accommodating requests, delicious food and cocktails, peaceful atmosphere, and reasonably priced luxury.

text: Warm welcome combined with exquisite cuisine. Wonderful boutique hotel, special thanks to Amila, Francesca and the team for their attention to detail and assistance. The restaurant deserves a special mention with spectacular view complimented by outstanding local and western dishes.
reviewText: Warm welcome combined with exquisite cuisine. Wonderful boutique hotel, special thanks to Amila, Francesca and the team for their attention to detail and assistance. The restaurant deserves a special mention with spectacular view complimented by outstanding local and western dishes.
summary: Guest experienced a warm welcome combined with exquisite cuisine at this wonderful boutique hotel, with special thanks to the team for their attention to detail and the restaurant's spectacular view and outstanding dishes.

text: Perfect destination to stay if you want to explore Mirissa. Whether you are alone or with family or friends - they stay. The vibe of property is mind blowing. A lot of thought has been given while designing the interiors and theme. Their breakfast is on the house and it felt like i am eating in a fine dinning restaurant. They personalise every dish like it was ordered from a 5 star restaurant. I travelled with my 1 year old daughter to celebrate her birthday and they were so nice to make special meals for her, cook as per our requirement. They also upgraded our room as a complimentary gesture. Since we are INDIANS and were travelling with my family, they offered us an Indian Dinner at their restaurant which was not there in the menu. The cocktails here are to die for. The staff here is very nice, polite and accommodating. All the chef were amazing. The location is just perfect with 5 mins walking to the beach. The last 2 mins journey to reach here is very steep. So make sure you drive carefully. The bed mattress felt a bit uncomfortable as it was very soft but that depends on person to person. I generally prefer hard mattress
reviewText: Perfect destination to stay if you want to explore Mirissa. Whether you are alone or with family or friends - they stay. The vibe of property is mind blowing. summary: Guest found it a perfect destination with a mind-blowing vibe, fine dining breakfast, personalized dishes, excellent staff, and perfect location, though noted the mattress was too soft for their preference.

text: An outstanding place to stay and to relax. The facilities are brand new and of high standards. You can see the bay right out of the bed and from the infinity pool you can enjoy the wilderness of the lush jungle. Special mention goes to the welcoming and attentive staff an the delicious food which is prepared with lots of love. The only small downside is a missing balcony, depending on wich room you are staying.
reviewText: An outstanding place to stay and to relax. The facilities are brand new and of high standards. You can see the bay right out of the bed and from the infinity pool you can enjoy the wilderness of the lush jungle. Special mention goes to the welcoming and attentive staff an the delicious food which is prepared with lots of love. The only small downside is a missing balcony, depending on wich room you are staying.
summary: Guest found it an outstanding place to stay and relax with brand new, high-standard facilities, bay views, an infinity pool, welcoming staff, and delicious food, with the only downside being a missing balcony in some rooms.

text: A stylist boutique hotel. We loved the staff, so helpful and kind and friendly all the time. Loved the hotel design, so much thought had gone into every corner. The rooms are compact but there is the perfect amount of room for a short stay. The rooms are very clean. Nothing
reviewText: A stylist boutique hotel. We loved the staff, so helpful and kind and friendly all the time. Loved the hotel design, so much thought had gone into every corner. The rooms are compact but there is the perfect amount of room for a short stay. The rooms are very clean. Nothing
summary: Guest found it a stylist boutique hotel, loving the staff, hotel design, and very clean rooms which were compact but perfect for a short stay.

text: Exceptional. Very helpful and attentive staff offering thoughtful touches and support. Clean and well maintained.
reviewText: Exceptional. Very helpful and attentive staff offering thoughtful touches and support. Clean and well maintained.

text: We stayed here 3 nights! The location is perfect very close to the beach. The food was unreal and the service and attent. Brand new hotel amazingly clean and comfortable facilities with the friendliest and most attentive staff

text: PERFECTA! Nuestra estancia en Niira, Mirissa fue simplemente perfecta. Tuvimos la suerte de alojarnos en una habitaciÃ³n muy especial y preciosa, con todo cuidado al detalle. Quiero destacar especialmente la amabilidad y lo agradables que son todos los trabajadores del hotel; desde el primer momento nos hicieron sentir como en casa. La comida fue exquisita en todo momento: desayuno, almuerzo y cena. Incluso tuvimos la suerte de coincidir con un cÃ³ctel que organizaron, y absolutamente todo estaba riquÃ­simo. AdemÃ¡s, nuestro vuelo salÃ­a muy tarde y hablamos con el manager para ver si era posible al menos ducharnos antes de partir. Sin dudarlo, nos facilitÃ³ una habitaciÃ³n para poder estar y ducharnos, un gesto increÃ­ble de amabilidad por el cual estamos eternamente agradecidos. Volveremos sin duda alguna. Un hotel maravilloso y un equipo humano excepcional. Nada
reviewText: PERFECTA! Nuestra estancia en Niira, Mirissa fue simplemente perfecta. Tuvimos la suerte de alojarnos en una habitaciÃ³n muy especial y preciosa, con todo cuidado al detalle. Quiero destacar especialmente la amabilidad y lo agradables que son todos los trabajadores del hotel; desde el primer momento nos hicieron sentir como en casa. La comida fue exquisita en todo momento: desayuno, almuerzo y cena. Incluso tuvimos la suerte de coincidir con un cÃ³ctel que organizaron, y absolutamente todo estaba riquÃ­simo. AdemÃ¡s, nuestro vuelo salÃ­a muy tarde y hablamos con el manager para ver si era posible al menos ducharnos antes de partir. Sin dudarlo, nos facilitÃ³ una habitaciÃ³n para poder estar y ducharnos, un gesto increÃ­ble de amabilidad por el cual estamos eternamente agradecidos. Volveremos sin duda alguna. Un hotel maravilloso y un equipo humano excepcional. Nada
summary: Guest found their stay perfect, highlighting a special and beautiful room with attention to detail, incredibly kind and friendly staff who made them feel at home, exquisite food, and an exceptional gesture of kindness from the manager for a late departure.

text: Eine Unterkunft, die keine WÃ¼nsche offen lÃ¤sst. Sehr saubere Unterkunft und das FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck lÃ¤sst keine WÃ¼nsche offen. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich. Wir haben uns sehr sehr wohl gefÃ¼hlt! /
reviewText: Eine Unterkunft, die keine WÃ¼nsche offen lÃ¤sst. Sehr saubere Unterkunft und das FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck lÃ¤sst keine WÃ¼nsche offen. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich. Wir haben uns sehr sehr wohl gefÃ¼hlt! /
summary: Guest found the accommodation left nothing to be desired, with a very clean property, a breakfast that met all expectations, very friendly staff, and they felt very comfortable.

text: Een van de beste hotels waar ik ben geweest! Een van de fijnste hotels waar ik ben geweest. Onwijs vriendelijke mensen, relaxte sfeer en hele mooie kamers. Het personeel is super vriendelijk en helpt met alles - je kunt alles vragen via Whatsapp en ze reageren snel en regelen alles voor je. Ook tijdens het ontbijt of lunch wordt er even een praatje met je gemaakt. Ik reis solo, en vond het heerlijk om m'n reis in Sri Lanka hier te beginnen. Erg goed eten (ontbijt/lunch/diner), goede cocktails/koffie en fijne sfeer. Het zwembad is rustig en er was altijd een plekje. De kamer is prachtig, alle faciliteiten zijn aanwezig en het is heel schoon. Stad en strand van Mirissa is 10-15 minuten lopen.
reviewText: Een van de beste hotels waar ik ben geweest! Een van de fijnste hotels waar ik ben geweest. Onwijs vriendelijke mensen, relaxte sfeer en hele mooie kamers. Het personeel is super vriendelijk en helpt met alles - je kunt alles vragen via Whatsapp en ze reageren snel en regelen alles voor je. Ook tijdens het ontbijt of lunch wordt er even een praatje met je gemaakt. Ik reis solo, en vond het heerlijk om m'n reis in Sri Lanka hier te beginnen. Erg goed eten (ontbijt/lunch/diner), goede cocktails/koffie en fijne sfeer. Het zwembad is rustig en er was altijd een plekje. De kamer is prachtig, alle faciliteiten zijn aanwezig en het is heel schoon. Stad en strand van Mirissa is 10-15 minuten lopen.
summary: Guest found it one of the best hotels they've stayed in, with friendly people, a relaxed atmosphere, beautiful rooms, super helpful staff accessible via WhatsApp, good food, cocktails, coffee, a nice pool, and a clean environment, located a 10-15 minute walk from Mirissa town and beach.

text: Exceptional. Todo un 10. Un hotel de Gran Lujo por su atenciÃ³n al detalle, su personal y el gran trabajo de su arquitecto. De lo mejor de Sri Lanka. Todo perfecto.
reviewText: Exceptional. Todo un 10. Un hotel de Gran Lujo por su atenciÃ³n al detalle, su personal y el gran trabajo de su arquitecto. De lo mejor de Sri Lanka. Todo perfecto.
summary: Guest rated it a perfect 10, describing it as a Grand Luxury hotel for its attention to detail, staff, and architecture, calling it one of the best in Sri Lanka with everything perfect.
